page.title: 06THE CANAL
page.content: The Worcester and Birmingham canal runs across the corner of the area crossing under the road and the railway line.Part of the towpath is overgrown with nettles and impossible to walk along and the sides of the canal are in need of repair.Men are working to restore and clear the canal and towpath. {They are part of the Community Service {Programme which is helping to find {jobs for unemployed people.}The canal is also used for leisure activities. Small boats use the canal and are moored along side the wharf.Fishermen also use the canal from the towpath using brightly coloured live maggots.
